::Rex::

Rex raises an eyebrow, not finding anything humorous about the situation, but 
nothing dangerous either. He puts away his pistol, walking over to retrieve 
his other gun. He stops short of the other gun as he realizes that she had 
said that she had been thinking of him.

"Why were you thinking of me?" he asks her, taking a few steps forward and 
picking up his other gun.
